welcome.botMessageContent: We’re engaging in video series exploring questions about faith and Jesus, together.
welcome.haveCodeInfo: You get to do video Adventures with others in Voke. Choose this if you received an Adventure invite code to easily join your friend or Group.

haveCode.botMessageTitle: Have a code from a friend?
haveCode.botMessageContent: Easily join your friend with an Adventure invite Code.

placeholder.whyNeedFriendsName: We use your friend's name to help you know who responded to the videos you shared.
placeholder.whyNeedGroupName: We use the Group name to onboard your friends and help you manage your Groups

common.oldConversationsCreateAccount: You need to create an account before requesting your conversations.
common.oldConversationsDescription: An email containing your conversations will be sent to:
common.sentOldConversations: Success! Check your email for information on your old conversations.
common.deleteDescription: You are about to remove your Voke account - which will delete all conversations, Adventure progress and user data, login credentials etc. You will not be able to recover this account if you proceed, but you can create a new one. Are you sure you want to do this?
common.shortPassword: Your password must be at least 8 characters
common.agreementExplore: By exploring, you agree to our
common.agreementCreate: By creating an account you agree to our

name.introMessage: I’m Vokebot, I’m glad you’re here.
name.needNameMessage: We need at least your first name so your friends know who you are

loading.allowContact: Please allow access to your contacts.
loading.contacts: Fetching your contacts - and because you are so popular, I need up to 30 seconds
loading.selectFriend: Search your contacts or take a step of faith with...
loading.share: Creating a link for you to share with your friend
loading.videos: Loading Some Awesome Videos for You

empty.contacts:
It’s empty in here...
You need some contacts
empty.noVideos: Finding some awesome videos for you.

error.adventureLocked: This Adventure is locked until you complete the current Adventure.
error.contactsDescription: There was an error getting your contacts.
error.playingVideo: There was an error playing the video.
error.somethingWentWrong: Uh oh! It looks like something went wrong.
error.sorryUnauth: Sorry, it looks like there was an error authorizing your request.
error.troubleVideo: We had trouble finding that video
error.tryAgain: There was an error, please try again.
error.userpass: Sorry, that username/password combination is not correct.
error.vokePermission: First grant Voke permission to access your contacts. Go to Settings / Voke and allow the permission for Contacts

forgotPassword.description: Please enter the correct email associated with your Voke account to reset the password
forgotPassword.emailPrompt: If you don't receive an email, it's most likely because you used a different email address. If so, try a different email address for password recovery

conversations.areYouSureBlock: Are you sure you want to block {{name}}?
conversations.nullText: I will let you know when your friends are watching the videos you shared.
conversations.questionBlock: Would you also like to block and report this person?
conversations.why: Please describe why you are reporting this person

imagePicker.selectOrNew: Would you like to select a photo or take a new picture?

kickstarters.description: Add one of these kickstarters to your chat.
kickstarters.nothing: Kickstarter questions will be visible after you select and share a video with a friend.

login.enterValid: Please enter a valid email and password
login.existingAccount: Successful login to an existing account from this screen will merge any guest account progress and conversations to your existing account.

modal.accountRequiredIntro: Group owners need protected accounts to manage members.
modal.description: Voke uses your contacts to make sharing quick and easy.
modal.deleteUserWarning: Removing a member from a Group means they will not be able to rejoin the Group in the future.
modal.deleteUserConfrimationText: {{name}} will not be able to join this group again.
modal.getLatestVoke:
We’ve made Voke even better!
Get the latest Voke updates.
modal.howDuoWorksBotBody: Learn more about it works, or get started right away.
modal.howGroupsWorkBotBody: Learn more about how they work below, or get started right away.
modal.howItWorksReleaseType: Choose how you’d like to go through content with your group.
modal.howItWorksAddMembers: Add up to 20 members to your Group from your Leader Zone
modal.howItWorksWatch: Watch each episode, answer the question, and unlock your friends’ answers.
modal.howDuoWorksChat: Then chat with your friend about the video and their answers.
modal.howGroupsWorkChat: Then chat with your friends about the video and their answers.
modal.howGroupsWorkLimit: You can have up to 20 members in your Voke Group.
modal.howDuoWorksShare: Share the Link or Adventure Code to the friend you want to join.
modal.howGroupsWorkShare: Share the Link or Adventure Code to the friends you want to join.
modal.howDuoWorksStart: Hit ‘Get Started’ if you’re ready to start with a friend.
modal.howGroupsWorkStart: Hit ‘Get Started’ if you’re ready to start your Group.
modal.howSharingWorksLink: Your friends will receive a link to a web page where they can watch a trailer and decide to join your Adventure.
modal.howSharingWorksPersonalize: It’s helpful to personalize what you say when you send the invite to your friends.
modal.howSharingWorksLetYouKnow: We’ll let you know when your friends join your Adventure.
modal.howSharingWorksLinkAccess: Anyone with the link has access to the code to join your Adventure.
modal.moreDescription:
1. By finding friends in your contacts you can share with.
2. To be encouraged when your friends are using Voke.
modal.moreTitle: Voke helps you start deeper conversations in two ways
modal.majorUpdate:
Major Update!
New features you can’t miss out on!
modal.title: User Address Book?
modal.updateToKeepUsing: Please update your app to the newest version to continue using Voke

overlays.adventurePush: Voke sends notifications when your friends join and interact with the Adventures you share, but first we need your permission.
overlays.playUkulele:
{{name}}, I play my Ukulele so you don’t miss out when your friends interact or join your Adventures!

But first, I need your permission to send you notifications.
overlays.signUpChannel: Sign up to subscribe and {{channel}} will let you know when new videos are published.
overlays.saveYourProgress: You are doing great! Create an account to save your progress and connect with more friends.

profile.passwordsLength: Passwords must be at least 8 characters
profile.signUp: Sign up to save your progress and access your account from anywhere.
profile.toEdit: To edit, select the item you would like to edit.

reportModal.title: Please describe why you are reporting this person
reportModal.introText: Help us understand. What is going on with this message?
reportModal.submited: Your report was submitted to the group leader to take action.
reportModal.reportingFooter: Reporting a user can result in them being banned from using this app.

signUp.accountDescription: Creating an account allows you to keep your conversations safe, retain your progress and access Voke from anywhere.
signUp.codeNotMatch: Code does not match the code that was sent to the mobile number
signUp.codeSentWait: A new verification code has already been sent, please wait a few seconds before re-sending
signUp.enterCodeSent: Please enter the code that was sent
signUp.fillInFields: Please fill in your first name and email
signUp.fillInName: Please fill in your first name
signUp.messageSent: A text message with your access code will be sent to this number.
signUp.numberDescription: Add your mobile number to invite your friends to a Voke chat via text message.
signUp.sharing: We love sharing, but we won't share your number.
signUp.verifyDescription: Finally, enter the 4-Digit Code you received by TXT so we know you are a human.

tryItNow.addPhoto: Photos help your friends recognize you when you do Adventures.
tryItNow.enterName: Please enter a name to continue
tryItNow.whatsYourName: What is your name? This way your friends will know who you are when you share!

videos.areYouSureAdd: Are you sure you want to add "{{name}}" video to your chat?

journey.finishedJourney: Congrats! You finished the Adventure. Now start it with someone else!
journey.whoCanYouTake: Who can you take with you?
journey.unsubscribeTitle: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from this Adventure?
journey.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this Adventure?

adventureCode.adventureCodeWhatsThisExplanation: You get to do video Adventures with others in Voke. This is the place for incoming guests who received an Adventure invite code to easily join their friend.

adventuresTab.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your invite to "{{name}}"?
adventuresTab.deleteCannotBeUndone: This cannot be undone. You can always invite them again by using "Invite a Friend".
adventuresTab.welcomeToAdventures: Welcome {{name}}! This is where you will find all of your Adventures with your friends.

manageGroup.reportModalText: Blocking a user will lock them out of the Voke application. They will no longer be able to use Voke. This cannot be undone.
manageGroup.memberBlockedText: Please, reach out to {{name}} and let them know the action you took.
manageGroup.noMembersYet: It’s just you right now, share the group link to invite members.

share.previewLinkReady: {{name}}’s invite is ready! The link below shares the Adventure trailer for {{name}} to watch and decide on joining you.
share.codeReady: {{name}}’s invite code is ready! Hit Share and choose how you’d like to send this invite code with {{name}}.
share.groupCodeReady: {{name}}’s invite code is ready! Hit Share and choose how you’d like to send this invite code to each of your Group members.
share.groupPreviewLinkReady: {{name}}’s invite is ready! The link below shares the Adventure trailer so your friends can watch and decide on joining you.
share.codeReadyResend: The same Adventure code is alive again. Send it if {{name}} needs it.
share.downloadMessage: Hi {{friend}}! Download Voke and join my Adventure. Use code: {{code}} {{appUrl}}
share.shareMessageVideo: Hey{{friend}}, check out this video I picked for you from the Voke app. {{link}}
share.shareMessage: Hey{{friend}}, I’d like you to join my video Adventure in Voke. Check out this short trailer. Use Adventure code {{code}}. {{link}}
share.chooseDate: Now let’s choose the date for the next release.
share.chooseTime: Now let’s choose the time for the next release.
share.needNameMessage: We need a name so you can manage your Adventures
share.groupReleaseSchedule: Select how you’d like to go through videos with your group.
share.groupReleaseManual:
You get to release content from 
the Leader Zone
share.groupReleaseManualReady: Whenever you’re ready, release new videos with the push of a button.
share.checkMessage: Check out this awesome app called Voke. Let's go deeper with God and others!
share.enterName: Please enter a name to continue
share.errorCreating: Sorry, there was an error creating the conversation. Please try again.
share.linkReady: Your link is ready! Hit share and choose how you want to send it.
share.who: Who do you want to share
share.leaderWillRelease: Your leader will release the next video
